amendment.description: To authorize the Chief of Protocol to use a passenger carrier for transportation between the Chief of Protocol's residence and place of employment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1151 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1151 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Breaux to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9162-9166; text: CR S9163) To authorize the Chief of Protocol to use a passenger carrier for transportation between the Chief of Protocol's residence and place of employment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1151 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1151 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Breaux to Amendment SA 1136.
